# chus.space

> Personal website and technical blog by Jesus M. Antonanzas (Chus).
> ML engineer working on LLM inference and applied AI.

## Blog posts

Each post is available as both HTML (rendered) and Markdown (source).
Markdown files include full content, LaTeX math, and citation metadata.
Please cite using the bibtex provided at the end of each post.

### State Space Models (3-part series)

- [Part 1: Introduction to SSMs](https://chus.space/blog/2024/ssm_1_context/)
  - Markdown: https://chus.space/blog/2024/ssm_1_context/ssm_1_context.md

- [Part 2: SSM networks and S4](https://chus.space/blog/2024/ssm_2_networks/)
  - Markdown: https://chus.space/blog/2024/ssm_2_networks/ssm_2_networks.md

- [Part 3: Mamba and Mamba-2](https://chus.space/blog/2024/ssm_3_mambas/)
  - Markdown: https://chus.space/blog/2024/ssm_3_mambas/ssm_3_mambas.md
